title: pagcryp
author: pagcryp
content: i sell italy binance acccount  full verified with 200 k daily limit if anyone interested in it dm me at TG:@pagescryp

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: It all smell scam.First, why would someone wanna buy a binance account that is fully verified in someone else's name and documents?Secondly, why would you want to sell it? So that once the buy makes a deposit in the account, you start claiming the account was stolen from you, they block the other user's funds, and you recover the account using your documents and claim the other person's funds too?

comments.author: pagcryp
comments.body: there is people that are interested in having other binance account because of limitation in wallet. and am not try to scam anyone i have proof also i give the possibility for the buyer to give me an email to make it the primarly email in the account. and also he can view everything throw anydesk

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: pagcryp on May 24, 2022, 09:05:54 AMand am not try to scam anyone i have proofWhat stops you recover the account by submitting your documents after the buyer has deposited money in there?Nothing.So the possibility to scam is... too high.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: pagcryp on May 24, 2022, 09:05:54 AMand am not try to scam anyone i have proof Can you share your proof that you aren't a scammer? I think this is necessary if you want to end a trade like this.Quote from: pagcryp on May 24, 2022, 09:05:54 AMalso i give the possibility for the buyer to give me an email to make it the primarly email in the account. But you can't change KYC verification documents, right? Plus it is very likely that Binance will require additional verification when withdrawing a larger amount of money.

comments.author: pagcryp
comments.body: for proof and anything you need just dm at TG:@pagescryp i will send you the proof and for big amount of money if you binance is full verified there is no problem in that

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: pagcryp on May 24, 2022, 12:25:26 PMfor proof and anything you need just dm at TG:@pagescryp i will send you the proof You said you had proof you weren't a scammer, there is no need to go into private discussion. Post it here, so everyone can be convinced of your words. note: that you own a Binance account is no proof that you are not a scammer.Quote from: pagcryp on May 24, 2022, 12:25:26 PMand for big amount of money if you binance is full verified there is no problem in that you say that now, while you are still looking for a buyer. what will happen in two or three months, and you become unavailable?Of course, a big amount is no problem for you, it's not your money.

comments.author: noormcs5
comments.body: Quote from: pagcryp on May 23, 2022, 05:44:19 PMi sell italy binance acccount  full verified with 200 k daily limit if anyone interested in it dm me at TG:@pagescrypYou need to understand that people will deposit their money in the binance account, so they won't risk buying some else account with someone else identity. There are too many risks involved here and it is better for someone to make his own account, verify it with his/her own KYC and don't take the risk of buying accounts.
